pages.text: Within this universe there are an effectively infinite number of challenging dungeons. To access these Dungeons, you will need to craft a portal which is reusable, and a key which is not. Each key that you create is bound to a specific dungeon instance, and can be used in any portal to access that dungeon.
Keys can also be removed from the portal into which they were inserted, which allows the portal to be re-used. The key can then be saved which will allow you to re-enter the dungeon in the future.
